name: Toy Tactics (itch)
description:
You're a toy soldier, and you have to defeat the enemy soldiers! Navigate through the warzones and battle against the AI Controlled enemy teams!

How to play

To win, you need to defeat all the enemies before they defeat all of your team! (Think of this like Worms) - When it's your turn, you can right-click to get up your weapons wheel, and use your mouse to select a weapon! You use that weapon in different ways which are explained on-screen. 

WASD - Move 

Space - Jump 

Left Click - Action 

Right Click - Weapons Wheel

Credits

Joe Shanahan - Programming / 3D

Amy Elliott - Programming / AI

As we are a team of two, we both done lots of different stuff!
